meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ali Hasan Jessica Rea Deirdre Thomas Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7787.

td.p: Ali Hasan, a secondary school teacher from New Westminster, British Columbia, Canada
Jessica Rea, a student from Carmichael, California
Deirdre Thomas, an attorney and editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,200)

tr.td: THE SHAPE OF THINGS
WORLD HISTORY
OUR FAVORITE SUFF-ICS
THAT REDUNDANCY IS REDUNDANT
FRANK SINATRA
CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Struck with a small steel rod, one of the simplest percussion instruments is this one named for its geometric shape')

tr.td: Deirdre
Jessica

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Deirdre] You picked the winner, the man who received the congratulatory telegram.)
DeirdreWho was Truman?
$9,999
JessicaWho is Harry Truman?
$8,500
AliWho is Dewey?
$9,601
Thomas Dewey')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'On Nov. 3, 1948 he sent a congratulatory telegram, then told reporters, "I was just as surprised as you"')

tr.td: 20th CENTURY AMERICAN HISTORY
On Nov. 3, 1948 he sent a congratulatory telegram, then told reporters, "I was just as surprised as you"
Deirdre
Jessica
Ali
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $20,401
Deirdre
Jessica
Ali

12 R
(including 1 DD),
5 W

22 R,
6 W
(including 2 DDs)
